post:
![](https://bandithost.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/11/BH-01.png)
**What's this?**
We got someting for you all!
Someone, somewhere, some how _acquired_ some **AMD Ryzen 3950X's**.
So if you're looking for AMD goodness, with fast ECC RAM and solid NVMe disks you're at the right spot!

**What's the catch?**
I don't want the alphabet soup busting down my door on Christmas or New Years, so nothing illegal and don't be a jerk.

**Here's the deal!**
Limited quantities available.

**INTRO-Ryzen-S-VPS**
1 CPU Core
1 GB Ram
10 GB NVMe Disk
1 TB Bandwidth
1 IPv4
[Starting at $4.99/m](https://clients.bandithost.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=25)

**INTRO-Ryzen-M-VPS**
2 CPU Core
2 GB Ram
25 GB NVMe Disk
2 TB Bandwidth
1 IPv4
[Starting at $7.00/m](https://clients.bandithost.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=26)

[See the full line up here!](https://clients.bandithost.com/cart.php?gid=7)

Location: Ogden, UT
Looking Glass: http://ut.test.bandithost.com
Test files: [100M](http://ut.test.bandithost.com/100MB.test) [1G](http://ut.test.bandithost.com/1G.test)

Feel free to PM with any questions or a ticket [here](https://clients.bandithost.com/contact.php)
